hero.subtitle: FrontWall sits in front of your WordPress site, caches everything as static content and serves it through a hardened security layer. Zero attack surface. Full functionality.

features.title: Defense in Depth
features.subtitle: Every layer adds protection. Every request is verified. Your WordPress stays hidden behind an impenetrable wall.
features.staticCachingDesc: Your entire WordPress site is crawled, cached, and served as pure static files. No PHP, no database queries, no vulnerabilities.
features.wafDesc: Multi-layer WAF blocks SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, bot scanners, and known attack patterns before they reach anything.
features.postSanitizationDesc: Contact forms and AJAX requests are validated against strict rules, sanitized for injection attacks, then forwarded to your WordPress.
features.geoipDesc: Block entire countries known for high attack volumes. Uses Cloudflare headers for zero-latency detection with optional GeoIP fallback.
features.rateLimitDesc: Per-IP token bucket rate limiting prevents brute force, DDoS, and resource exhaustion. Static assets bypass limits intelligently.
features.analyticsDesc: Real-time dashboard with threat detection, attacker IP tracking, event timelines, and severity breakdowns for full visibility.
features.cspDesc: Content Security Policy is auto-generated from your site's actual resources. Learn mode discovers external origins automatically.
features.learnModeDesc: Automatically discover POST rules, CSP origins, and missing assets. FrontWall learns your site's needs, then locks down.
features.bypassModeDesc: Need to update WordPress? Enable bypass to proxy all traffic directly to the origin. Disable it when done — no redeploy needed.
features.multiSiteDesc: Protect multiple WordPress sites from a single FrontWall instance, each with independent security configurations and ports.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your WordPress from a liability into a fortress.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Enter your WordPress URL and configure crawler settings. FrontWall automatically discovers all pages, assets, and forms.
howItWorks.step2Desc: The spider captures your entire site. Review cached pages, set up POST rules for forms, and fine-tune security settings.
howItWorks.step3Desc: One click deploys a hardened reverse proxy. All traffic is served from cache. Attacks are blocked. Your WordPress is invisible.

protection.title: What We Block
protection.subtitle: FrontWall protects against the most common and dangerous WordPress attack vectors.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Your WordPress never sees the internet. FrontWall handles everything.

install.title: Quick Start
install.subtitle: Get FrontWall running in under 2 minutes with Docker.
